head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HICKS, ETHEL PERRY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HICKS, ETHEL PERRY

block.p: HICKS--Ethel Perry on October 27, 2005. Beloved wife of the late Attorney William H. Perry. Cherished mother of William H. and Ethel Denise Perry. Beloved son-in-law Ken Grate, sister of Comora Thomas, loving grandmother of Sarah, Derick, Sandra, Michelle, Joseph, Alma, Nicholas, Jose, Billy, Roslyn, Sharissa and Chanel. Greatgrandmother of David and Chasity. Family receiving Monday 7-9 and Tuesday 2-5, 7-9. Funeral service Wednesday 11AM at St. Marks United Methodist Church. Entombment Woodlawn Cemetery.
